attributes.action: Let the electorate have the right to call for a vote of total no confidence in this or any other admistration's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I, like everyone else in the UK are law-abiding British Citizen's, but I  personally am sad that this once great country of ours is being slowly ruined for future generations by the political spin-doctors who were NOT elected by us as our representatives.

Great Britain is once again on the verge of bankcruptcy and civil unrest whatever the Government says.

Will it take another Wat Tyler to lead us out of this debacle?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
